name: closefriend
text: A comment left by closefriend was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by stop, Zeno, kingsleymc, VictoriaW)

name: kingsleymc
text: Poot!

name: ssddr
text: Ray is wearing a mawashi.

name: genequagmire
text: Chubby for not saying "sumo thong".  Damn you, The Simpsons!

name: everything_is_a_hat
text: A comment left by everything_is_a_hat was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by serf, Panserbjorne, STUART)

name: clembot
text: big american party

name: kamet
text: O No, BEAR is driving!

name: fuzzyshoo
text: how can that be!?

name: fattypneumonia
text: ENDUT!  HOCH HECH!

name: hassanoleary
text: Everybody disco DANCING!

name: epicurus
text: I always misread "hella side effect" as " hello side effect", which is IMO even better somehow.

name: tombsgrave
text: ...holy shit!  It DOES say "hella!"  And you're right, "hello" is better.

name: slalvation
text:
... oh.

huh.

name: mrectomy
text: It is better, because if you read the "hello" like, you know, when someone grabs your junk and you don't see it coming. It sounds awesome.

name: mfrance
text: It actually reads "product" not "effect" as well... but hey, 1 word in 3 isn't bad! It's strange how our brains sometimes correct broken English for us.

name: centipede_damascus
text: A comment left by centipede_damascus was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Overmedicated, uberbee, _cheesekayke, littlefatdog)

name: aaron_haynes
text: As bizarrely and perfectly Engrish as this is, Achewood's style still peeks through in panel five.

name: sargasm
text: Have you heard of hitting it Mountain-Style:  The man sits absolutely still for millenia and the woman climbs all over him.

name: shoinan
text: A comment left by shoinan was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by goocifer, TonyHighwind, dickie_roxx, Zem, gorrioncita, morbo)

name: zem
text: that is the dictionary definition of a terrible idea (websters)

name: shoinan
text: Yeah, on reflection, this was a bad idea. I'll just stick to telling them to say good things about my dick.

name: relaxing
text: You may be wrong.

name: honesttom
text: "Life is never neat; life is always bad" is basically how I explain Stoicism to people.

name: rowboat
text: Am I the only one who had a lot of trouble seeing Ray's glasses as anything other than just one huge eye? It's still bothering me.

name: sortelli
text: Not anymore.  Thanks!

name: pogo
text: Like the robot in "The Day the Earth Stood Still."

name: foea
text: That was my thought. The Japanese love that robot.

name: anitrophaeron
text: Gort, god dammit, GORT!  Not "the robot".

name: professorhazard
text: This is my favorite Achewood strip, but I've always been a sucker for Engrish.

name: professorhazard
text: And now I have a signed and framed copy of it. Life is good.

name: gouldgonewild
text: Not that I dislike the strip, but I am surprised to hear that this is your favorite one

name: daidai
text: This is one of the few strips that I actually dislike. I know I'll probably be lamed for saying that, but I really do hate this one for some reason. I can't even think of another strip I can say that about except that guest comic with the masturbating.

name: rowboat
text: You hate it? That's weird. To not particularly care for it is one thing, but to hate it....does it offend you personally?

name: history
text: I love anime for some reason which I prefer not to define to myself.  This comic sums up why you should never get the anime that has been dubbed in English.  Always get the Japanese with English subtitles.  Just a friendly tip if you don't already know.

name: direhaggis
text: 7-kinky the making which is twisted emits the hella love mountain.

name: wonelove
text:
Nah, you don't usually get seven-kinky pills from the pharmacists...
maybe in Japan?
hella seven-kinky

name: jonmw
text: What really makes this strip for me is how fruity Teodor looks.

name: redphillip
text:
Somehow I came upon 'seven-kinky' very early in my exploration of Achewood. Though I have no clear idea what the hell it means I find it brilliant, and it helped cement me to the Achewood life.

BTW, I also love Engrish, and panel 7 is a remarkably concise statement of Stoicism.

name: serf
text: hella side product makes this strip a 5er.

name: paigejay
text: The sad lines coming off Teodor's head in the last panel are great.

name: zapatos
text: it is impossible to have a good day

name: carlyle
text: I DON'T UNDER-FUCKING-STAND

name: lolsworth
text: Kono manga wa yoi manga desu. N%u012Bsu no shigoto. Subarashii sutairu. K%u014D 5.
